use.flag: Support automatic decompression of LZMA-compressed files and kernel images

Build experimental eu-stacktrace tool. Relies on integration with dev-util/sysprof.
See https://developers.redhat.com/articles/2024/06/11/get-system-wide-profiles-binaries-without-frame-pointers.
Install command-line utilities (all the eu-* programs)
Enable debuginfod support, both the debuginfod server and the libdebuginfod client library
